title: Sketchbook Folio, "Sun over Ocean with Breaking Waves", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Beach at right in foreground with curling waves coming onto shore. In sky at right, sun hovers behind hazy clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Sun over Ocean with Breaking Waves", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-69.
